comment: Dr. Yon is a very great person. He's pretty detailed because that how people in industry are. I really liked him and his class because his main purpose was nothing but your learning.
Dr. Yon is pretty good. I really liked his class. He tries his best to help you as much as he can. Very helpful professor.

Class will be entertaining as long as you can deal with his personality. Labs are pretty much non-existant. Class subject will include things learned in ECET3000 but you probably forgot & don't be the fool that falls for Yon's tricks. The Final pject & Final lab will be insane & not be mentioned at all during the semester. Good luck.

This man in absolutely insane. You will not discuss anything useful, you will not have any grades, there will be no assignments, you might do one or two labs, then you'll have a final project and a final exam over topics that were not even remotely close to anything mentioned in class.
